about_the_game: The soundtrack of Five Nights at Restroom 2. Contains Horror, Orcheatral, 8-Bit and more types of music. The songs in this album are made for different parts of the game, menu, clock minigame, Pigeon and Hawk minigames, credits and Hellish Week book.
detailed_description: The soundtrack of Five Nights at Restroom 2. Contains Horror, Orcheatral, 8-Bit and more types of music. The songs in this album are made for different parts of the game, menu, clock minigame, Pigeon and Hawk minigames, credits and Hellish Week book.
name: Five Nights at Restroom 2: A Hellish Soundtrack

short_description: The soundtrack of Five Nights at Restroom 2. Contains Horror, Orcheatral, 8-Bit and more types of music. The songs in this album are made for different parts of the game, menu, clock minigame, Pigeon and Hawk minigames and credits.
